project_descr: Enhanced national capacity for climate change adaptation and mitigation

outputs.output_descr: Multi-sectoral adaptation & mitigation response to climate change developed. The project aims to assist the economic sectors to develop response mechanism to address the impacts of climate change and build the resilience of such sectors to the negative impacts of climate and environmental change with a view to promoting sustainable development. The key sectors include water, energy and agriculture.
Support to policy and enabling environment for uptake of cleaner energy sources
Increased sectoral capacity to assess vulnerability and monitor impacts of climate change.

document_name: Development of the Environmental Management Act (EMA)
